data: “Hallo! young lady, what on earth are you doing here?” and Gerrard bent down over his horse’s shoulder, and looked inquiringly into the face of a small and exceedingly ill-clad girl of about ten years of age.

“Hallo! young lady, what on earth are you doing here?” and Gerrard bent down over his horse's shoulder, and looked inquiringly into the face of a small and exceedingly ill-clad girl of about ten years of age.
